Toggle Menu

salt.output.nested

Recursively display nested data

This is the default outputter for most execution functions.

Example output:

myminion:
    ----------
    foo:
        ----------
        bar:
            baz
        dictionary:
            ----------
            abc:
                123
            def:
                456
        list:
            - Hello
            - World

output

Syntax

salt.output.nested.output(
								ret
								)

Details

Display ret data

NestDisplay Class

Syntax

salt.output.nested.NestDisplay

Details

Manage the nested display contents

NestDisplay.display Method

Syntax

display(
								ret,
								indent,
								prefix,
								out
								)

Details

Recursively iterate down through data structures to determine output

NestDisplay.ustring Method

Syntax

ustring(
								indent,
								color,
								msg,
								prefix='',
								suffix='',
								endc=None
								)
